Name: Mika and Sadie's Adventure
About the game: Genre Heroine Abuse Action About In this game, you play the role of Sadie, the diabolical heroine, who follows (forcibly) the heroine, Mika, to the Demon King's headquarters. In this game, you play as Sadie, a diabolical heroine, who follows (forcibly) her heroine, Mika, to the Demon King's justice. Mica can learn magic to attack and use recovery magic. The hero, on the other hand, can attack, stun, and rape not only his enemies, but also his ally, Mika. He can also throw the stunned Mika to attack her. Become the diabolical hero and defeat the demon king. Voice Hiiragi Mafuyu (@hiiragi_mafuyu) System - Combine with a female character who attacked and stunned you. - The stunned character can be lifted and thrown. - Mica can learn magic and support your attacks. - When you finish the game, all galleries will be opened. Story A village is suffering from heavy taxes imposed by the Demon King. In this game, you will have to fight against the demon king's forces. Contents - 11 standing pictures (2 erotic) - 6 H scenes (interactive x2, animation x4) - 5 bosses (2 female bosses with pornography, 3 male bosses) - 6 stages (including 1 tutorial and 1 town)
